title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
Bring the heart of the season to your table with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. In a serene blue and finished with a smooth, glossy feel, each 17 x 17-inch cloth napkin is beautifully embroidered in radiant gold with uplifting words—Joy, Love, Blessed, Merry, Believe, and Peace—echoing the true spirit of Christmas.

Thoughtfully designed with a nativity theme, these reusable polyester napkins elevate holiday dinners, church gatherings, and festive celebrations with meaningful style. Soft yet durable, they’re washable for effortless cleanup and crafted to be enjoyed year after year. Whether you’re dressing up your own tablescape or gifting to family, friends, or fellow believers, this set of 12 creates a cohesive, elegant look that’s both celebratory and reverent.

- Set of 12 embroidered Christmas cloth napkins
- Size: 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm)
- Material: Smooth, glossy polyester
- Color: Blue with gold embroidered texts
- Washable and reusable for eco-friendly entertaining
- Ideal for Christmas parties, religious gatherings, and festive meals

Make every place setting a message of faith and joy. Celebrate the season with a table that tells the story—beautifully.
